thread.title: The New Test for Cash-Strapped U.S. States: Teacher Protests

author: Heather Gillers
title: The New Test for Cash-Strapped U.S. States: Teacher Protests
text:
Phoenix physics teacher Mike Vargas and his colleagues at Pinnacle High School tried for years to seek raises from their local district. This year they are taking their demands to a much larger venue: the state capital.
“I don’t blame my school district at all,” said Mr. Vargas, who prepared signs for a recent statewide teacher protest in front of the Arizona capitol building. “I would say it’s totally the state’s fault.”
Teacher... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
